III.ii.2.A.7.a
.
How VAMCs Should Request Service Records
VAMCs may use VIS to verify a Veteran’s service.  If VIS does not provide service verification, or if VAMCs require clinical records or other service-related documentation, they should request it by sending
VA Form 10-7131
,
Exchange of Beneficiary Information and Request for Administrative and Adjudicative Action
,
to the appropriate RO.
Note
:  It is VA policy that
only
ROs may request service records.
Reference
:  For more information on VIS, see the
VIS User Guide
.
